definition: means 'yes definitely', 'for sure', or 'without a doubt' - used for strong agreement
examples: are you going to the party tonight? absolutely
did you like the movie? absolutely it was amazing
would you recommend this restaurant? absolutely

definition: used to emphasize truth or correct misconceptions, often with attitude
examples: actually I was here first
that's actually not what happened
I actually don't care what they think

definition: means extremely cute or endearing, used for people, animals, or things
examples: that puppy is absolutely adorable
your little sister is so adorable
this tiny coffee shop is adorable

definition: refers to a particular style or vibe, especially visual appearance or overall mood
examples: her room has such a cozy aesthetic
I love the dark academia aesthetic
this cafe has the perfect study aesthetic

definition: abbreviation for 'also known as' - used to give an alternative name or description
examples: my best friend aka the funniest person alive
pizza aka the perfect food
monday morning aka my worst enemy

definition: means 'okay', 'fine', or 'acceptable' - can show agreement or mild satisfaction
examples: how was the test? it was alright
alright let's go to dinner
the movie was alright nothing special

definition: means extremely good, impressive, or wonderful - strong positive reaction
examples: that concert was amazing
you did amazing on your presentation
this food tastes amazing

definition: used to describe someone who is extremely kind, helpful, or sweet
examples: thanks for helping me move you're an angel
she's such an angel for bringing me soup
my mom is literally an angel

definition: abbreviation for 'as soon as possible' - indicates urgency or immediate need
examples: text me back asap
we need to leave asap
call me asap it's important

definition: means someone performed exceptionally well or 'killed it' - past tense of delivering excellence
examples: she ate that performance
you ate with that outfit
he absolutely ate that presentation

definition: means feeling romantic or physical interest in someone
examples: I'm definitely attracted to them
she's attracted to funny guys
are you attracted to anyone in our class

definition: refers to someone's energy, vibe, or overall presence and how they make others feel
examples: she has such positive aura
his confident aura is attractive
that place has a weird aura

definition: means single or not in a relationship, ready to date
examples: is she available or seeing someone
I'm finally available again
sorry I'm not available right now

definition: means extremely bad, terrible, or unpleasant
examples: that movie was awful
I feel awful about what happened
the weather is awful today

definition: describes uncomfortable, embarrassing, or socially tense situations
examples: that conversation was so awkward
running into my ex was awkward
I made things awkward by bringing that up

definition: term of endearment used for romantic partners, close friends, or cute things
examples: hey baby how was your day
that puppy is such a baby
don't worry baby it'll be okay

definition: stands for 'before anyone else' - term for romantic partner or crush
examples: going out with bae tonight
miss you bae
bae is picking me up later

definition: means makeup application or when someone looks really good with their makeup done
examples: her face is beat to perfection

she always looks beat for special occasions

definition: means extremely attractive, pretty, or aesthetically pleasing
examples: you look beautiful today
what a beautiful sunset
she has beautiful eyes

definition: short for 'best friend' - used for close friends or sometimes ironically
examples: hey bestie want to go shopping
my bestie always has my back
bestie we need to talk about this drama

definition: means 'yes', 'okay', 'sounds good', or 'I agree' - universal agreement word

meet me at 6pm? bet that works
you bringing snacks? bet

definition: means 'that's totally relatable' or 'I feel that deeply' - stronger than just 'mood'

hating monday mornings is a big mood

definition: means very strange, weird, or unusual in a notable way

definition: means feeling grateful, lucky, or favored - often used to show appreciation
examples: feeling so blessed to have good friends

definition: to prevent someone from contacting you on social media or messaging apps
examples: I had to block my ex on instagram
block them if they keep bothering you

definition: refers to older people, especially those seen as out of touch with modern culture

definition: means the worst category or lowest quality - opposite of top tier

definition: abbreviation for 'be right back' - indicates temporary absence
examples: brb going to grab some food

definition: casual term for friend, buddy, or to address someone - not just males

definition: expression of disbelief, frustration, or 'seriously?' - variation of 'bro'

definition: means laughing very hard, uncontrollably - more intense than just laughing
